channel.title: Video Game tournament system
channel.description:
Hey guys, For my A2 computing class I have to design and program a tournament system in java, and I just wanted to post a quick survey to help me get an idea of how I should do it. If you could please copy and paste this survey with your answers I would be very happy. Thanks.^_^
1. How many players would you like to be entered on average? a) 1-4 b) 4-8 c) 8-16 d) 16-32 e) >32
2. would you like a point system so you can see which clan scored highest? a) yes b) no
3. Would you like Clan tags a) yes b) no
4. How many players Per round? a) 2 b) 4 c) 8
5. Random opponents or player defined matches? a) Random b) Player defined
6. Match shuffle each round so there is no telling who you will face next? a) yes b) no
Please suggest any other points you think would make my system better:

item.title: Video Game tournament system
item.dc:creator: Scrue
item.description:
Thanks guys

Read full topic

item.title: Video Game tournament system
item.dc:creator: Harry-UK
item.description:
1. How many players would you like to be entered on average?
[COLOR=‘Orange’]D) 16-32

2. Would you like a point system so you can see which clan scored highest?
[COLOR=‘orange’]A) Yes

3. Would you like Clan tags?
[COLOR=‘orange’]A) Yes

4. How many players Per round?
[COLOR=‘orange’]C) 8

5. Random opponents or player defined matches?
[COLOR=‘orange’]B} Player Defined

6. Match shuffle each round so there is no telling who you will face next?
[COLOR=‘orange’]A) Yes

I actually went to a 16-32 MW2 tournament last week in London; it was awesome! I also won a Dolby 7.1 Gaming Headset. It’s sweet.

Good luck with the project. :3

Read full topic

item.title: Video Game tournament system
item.dc:creator: Scrue
item.description:
Hey guys,
For my A2 computing class I have to design and program a tournament system in java, and I just wanted to post a quick survey to help me get an idea of how I should do it.
If you could please copy and paste this survey with your answers I would be very happy. Thanks.

  1. How many players would you like to be entered on average?
    a) 1-4
    b) 4-8
    c) 8-16
    d) 16-32
    e) >32

  2. would you like a point system so you can see which clan scored highest?
    a) yes
    b) no

  3. Would you like Clan tags
    a) yes
    b) no

  4. How many players Per round?
    a) 2
    b) 4
    c) 8

  5. Random opponents or player defined matches?
    a) Random
    b) Player defined

  6. Match shuffle each round so there is no telling who you will face next?
    a) yes
    b) no

Please suggest any other points you think would make my system better:
